document_data.caption: A circa 1367 DR map showing Hunters' Alley, with the [[Plinth]] highlighted
document_data.name: Hunters' Alley
document_data.starts: [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Hunters' Alley''' was a narrow, hard-packed dirt and [[gravel]] paved, alleyway in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: This road ran in a straight line east from [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], across from [[Soothsayer's Way]]. Midway through the passage, it acted as the southern terminus of [[Burdag Lane]].
document_data.History: Hunters' Alley was named for two young, courageous brothers, who grew up to become a sage and an aspiring duke.
document_data.Reputation: This alleyway was generally a safe passage to journey through.
